item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Ida Scott Taylor
item.description: "Do not look back and grieve over the past, for it is gone; and do not be troubled about the future, for it has yet to come. Live in the present, and make it so beautiful that it will be worth remembering" -- Ida Scott Taylor

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them." -- Aristotle

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "Educate your children to self-control, to the habit of holding passion and prejudice and evil tendencies subject to an upright and reasoning will, and you have done much to abolish misery from their future and crimes from society." -- Benjamin Franklin
